column1: You agree not to use or launch any automated system, including without limitation, "robots," "spiders," or "offline readers," that accesses the service in a manner that sends more request messages to the fanfiction.net servers in a given period of time than a human can reasonably produce in the same period by using a conventional on-line web browser.
Fanfiction.net reserves the right to remove content and user submissions without prior notice.
